canonicalQuestion: How do I reset the MFA token for a user?
shortAnswer: Use the FortiIdentity Cloud admin portal to revoke the existing token and issue a new activation QR code.
stepByStep: Open FortiIdentity Cloud and sign in with admin privileges.
Select the affected user and choose 'Revoke token'.
Click 'Issue new token' to generate a new activation email or QR code.
constraints: Applies to FortiIdentity Cloud v2.1 and later
caveats: User must re-enroll the authenticator app after reset
